materials.name: Instructor Information
materials.description: Professor: Tedd Wong, Email: twong76@mtsac.edu, Phone: 909-274-4425, Office: 61-2505, Office Hours: 6:30 pm MW before class and 8:25 MW after class

materials.name: Course Website (CANVAS)
materials.description: Access via Mt. SAC portal (http://inside.mtsac.edu) for announcements, notes, homework solutions, and assignment submission.

materials.name: Required Materials
materials.description: Textbook: Engineering Mechanics: Statics, by R.C. Hibbeler, 15th ed. Other: Scientific calculator (e.g., TI-36, TI-84), straight-edge, quad rule pad (recommended).

materials.name: Grading Scale
materials.description: Homework: 10%, Midterm 1: 15%, Midterm 2: 15%, Midterm 3: 15%, Project: 20%, Final: 25%. (A: 90-100, B: 80-89, C: 70-79, D: 60-69, F: <59)

materials.name: Course Expectations
materials.description: Access Canvas daily, attend and participate, take notes, complete assignments on time, collaborate, and master the material.

assignments.name: HW0
assignments.description: General Principles; Scalars and Vectors. In class.

materials.name: Holiday
materials.description: No class session for the holiday.

materials.description: Chapter 4.8: Simplify Force and Couple - Force and Distance; Chapter 4.9: Distributed Loading - Force and Distance

modules.module_name: Week 7: Equilibrium of a Rigid Body
